hero.title: A Pro-Grade Order Book DEX for Everyone
hero.description: The convenience of a centralized exchange order book system combined with the freedom of decentralization. Easy for beginners, more powerful for experts.

card1.title: Orderly Network's White-Label Infrastructure
card1.description: ADEN is built on the white-label solution of the global futures trading infrastructure, Orderly Network, ensuring secure asset transfers at any time with proven technology.
card1.subtitle: White-label Derivatives Exchange
card1.features:
Instant deposits and withdrawals
Full control over assets

card2.title: Trusted Infrastructure Chosen by Leading Exchanges
card2.description: Orderly is a trading infrastructure recognized for its reliability and technological strength, trusted by major domestic and global exchanges such as Bithumb, Bybit, and Bitget.
card2.subtitle: Listed Exchange
card2.features:
Orderly - Listed on Bithumb, Bybit
Project ongoing since 2022
Market-validated infrastructure
CEX-level speed and stability

card3.title: Global-Grade Engine + ADEN's Unique Innovation
card3.description: ADEN shares Orderly Network's global order book with WOOFi and Raydium, providing the same liquidity and trade execution experience. We offer an optimized trading experience based on the stability and speed of a world-class trading engine.
card3.subtitle: Global Order Book Sharing Partners
card3.features:
Sharing Orderly Network with Raydium and WOOFi.
Stable trading environment with verified partners

card4.title: ADEN partnering with market-proven projects
card4.description: ADEN partners with major exchange-listed projects like Raydium and WOOFi. We provide a stable and reliable trading environment through the same Orderly Network used by projects verified on global exchanges such as Binance and Upbit.
card4.subtitle: Major Exchange Listed Projects
card4.features:
Raydium - Listed on Upbit, Binance, OKX
WOOFi - Listed on Binance, OKX, Bybit

features.orderBook: Real-time order book depth and market data
features.orderTypesDesc: Implement sophisticated trading strategies with limit orders, market orders, stop orders, and more.

security.title: A New Standard for Asset Security
security.description1: Assets are managed directly by smart contracts, not centralized exchanges
security.description2: Transparent transactions powered by smart contract logic

reliability.title: Reliable Operation with 24/7 Uptime
reliability.description1: No system maintenance or service downtime
reliability.description2: Runs continuously to match global market demands

unrestricted.title: Unrestricted Trading Environment
unrestricted.description1: No daily limits or trading restrictions of any kind—trade freely and openly.
unrestricted.description2: All users are offered the same tools and equal trading conditions at all times.
